title: Content frames not displaying on certain websites.
content:
My Firefox (95.0.2 and many previous) seems to be having issues displaying content on some sites. It isn't on all websites and is consistent with the ones affected. www.penny-arcade.com is one of the afflicted sites. Paragraphs of text just do not appear and I run minimal plugins/addons. Pages run correctly in Troubleshoot mode. Pages also are correct in other browsers.

Things I have tried: Refresh FF Reinstall FF (nuking reg entries and scouring installation folders after uninstall) Turn off/uninstall All plugins/addons Enable/Disable HTTPS only Turn on/off Hardware Acceleration Standard/Strict/Custom Security & Privacy settings Some True to False option in about:config about mixed content (I can't seem to remember what...)

I have tried to resolve this on my own. For the life of me I can't seem to figure out why.
creator: samuelwatters
